quest.name: Counting Pixies
journal:
 Quest Sync
The chipper pixie looks at you playfully.
objectives: Use the spyglass to count the number of pixies.

dialogue.name: PIXIE03402
dialogue.text: Oh, to have so many mortals visiting us... I can scarcely contain my excitement!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03402
dialogue.text: I know a really fun game! Come with me, and we'll have oodles of fun together!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03402
dialogue.text: There you are! Here, I will lend you this tube.

dialogue.name: PIXIE03402
dialogue.text: A spyglass, I believe you mortals call it, and it makes small things look big. We're going to use it for our game.

dialogue.name: PIXIE03402
dialogue.text: The rules are simple: stand over there, look through the spyglass, and count the pixies. If you get our number right, I'll give you a fabulous prize!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Inspect the designated location to look through the spyglass and begin counting pixies.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will have thirty seconds to complete the task, after which you may give your answer to the chipper pixie.

dialogue.name: PIXIE03402
dialogue.text: Stand over there, look through the spyglass, and count the pixies. There's nothing to it!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03402
dialogue.text: Done counting, are you? So, how many of us are there?

dialogue.name: PIXIE03402
dialogue.text: Are you sure? Really, truly, absolutely sure? Because if you aren't, you should check again!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03402
dialogue.text:
Correct, there are four of us! Well done, mortal! Here's the fabulous prize I─
...Oh, fiddlesticks, I left it back at Lydha Lran!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03402
dialogue.text: Well, we'll just have to make a game of it. Last one back to the village is a rotten egg!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03402
dialogue.text: Tee hee, beat you back! I get to turn you into a rotten egg!

dialogue.name: PIXIE03402
dialogue.text: ...Oh, I jest, I jest! I won't turn you into a rotten egg─not so soon after you played with me, at any rate. Here's your prize. Let's play again soon!
